Genetic Adversarial Network¶

This is a use case of EvoFlow

Another example of a multinetwork model, a GAN. In order to give an automatic fitness fuction to each GAN, we use the Inception Score (IS, https://arxiv.org/pdf/1606.03498.pdf) We use the MobileNet model instead of Inception because it gave better accuracy scores when training it.

gan.discriminator_loss(fake_out, real_out)¶
